messages.Start: Hello! I am a bot that sends you forecasts. Select an action
messages.RequestLocation: Enter your location. Click the button or enter your place manually
messages.RequestDayError: The day is entered incorrectly. Please try again
messages.RequestPlaceName: Select location from the list. If you did not find the desired location, try entering your location again
messages.InValidPlaceName: Invalid input. Please, provide a valid location name
messages.NoLocation: You haven't set a location yet
